page.title: 04GIRLS' DAY, RIDDLESWORTH
page.content: We are twelve year old girls at a boarding school. At 7.l5 we get up and ready for breakfast at 8.00, then tidying up the dormitories. Lessons start at 9.00 after prayers in the main school hall. There are nine 40 minute lessons every day with a half hour break in the morning and one and a half hours for lunch. At break we go to Pets Corner to feed our animals such as hamsters, guinea pigs, rabbits, rats and mice. Lessons end at 4.25 and we have free time where we play on the Adventure Playground, play tennis, read or talk with our friends. At 5.15 a bell goes for prep followed by tea and vespers and then we can play again until bedtime at 8.35pm. We can see the school nurse at the surgery where we take our vitamins or medicines. Then we go to bed in a dormitory with about three other girls
